mapper.insert: insert into basic_oplog (pkid,type, code,opapp, opmodule, opip, userid, username, createtime, status, opremark) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{opapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opremark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_oplog set opmodule = #{opmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opapp = #{opapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opip = #{opip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opremark = #{opremark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid,type,code,opapp, opmodule, opip, userid, username, createtime, status, opremark from basic_oplog
mapper.delete: delete from basic_oplog where createtime < DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
